ExtendibleHashingScheme

Class DataFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ExtendibleHashingScheme.DataFile

  • class DataFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a file in the OS which is divided into many blocks. Here we have chosen each block to be equal to a bucket.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int blockingFactor
      The numbers of keys that can be stored in a Bucket.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<Bucket> dataFileBuckets
      The list of the buckets that belong to this file.

      Retuns the numbers of buckets currently present in the DataFile.

        Merges an Empty Bucket to the Bucket it was split from.
        Parameters:
        emptyBucket - Empty Bucket that needs to be merged.
        mergeToBucket - The Bucket that the empty bucket will be merged with.

      • getBucket

        protected Bucket getBucket(java.lang.String bitString)
        The numbers of keys that can be stored.
        Parameters:
        bitString - The bit string of the key generated to search for the bucket it exists in.
        Returns:
        The Bucket which has the key.

      • getSisterBucket

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The Bucket which the other split half.
